title: Forgotten mod
body:
Riot forgot my favorite game mod Black Market Brawlers. I only need to know do maybe this mod can come back plz.
Thank you anyway.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: I'll bite: What's black market brawlers?
It was a gamemode that came out with the Gangplank rework, and was never seen again.

They have to make it work on the new client before it can come back. Easier ones like poro king etc. were easier to make work on the client. I wouldn't be surprised if that was the next one on the list (Current one being tested for bugs on the PBE is ARURF)
Poro king is being tested on the PBE currently (some new portal mode for it) URF is coming back tomorrow on live
